title: Global Update: Early signs of a slowing death rate in Europe's worst-hit countries
description: Global Update: Early signs of a slowing death rate in Europe's worst-hit countries
content:
Austria plans to start easing coronavirus restrictions
A man walks a dog in Vienna on Monday. Lisi Niesner / Reuters
The Austrian government is planning to slowly re-open shops, hotels and restaurants as the country hopes to start returning to normal life a… [+6990 chars]
